name: Bare-Bones Apothecary
description:
One part potion puzzler, one part grave-robbing game, Bare-Bones Apothecary puts your resurrected bones in charge of a potion shop during its busiest season. But you can’t show up to the fall festival looking like this. Good thing there’s just enough time to rob body parts from the fresh graves of those you’ve “accidentally” poisoned.

HOW TO PLAY
  • Open the recipe book. Find the correct recipe based on irresponsibly vague descriptions.
  • Drag and drop three magical ingredients into the cauldron.
  • Hope you guess enough recipes correctly and your customers don't run you out of town.
  • Decide whether to poison your clients or their rivals. Steal their nice calves later.
CURRENT FEATURES

Bare-Bones Apothecary is currently in alpha, with unique music tracks, art, and a branching narrative simmering until the release date.

  • 4 days to fulfill potion orders for regular customers
  • 4 nights to choose the fates and rob the graves of clients and their rivals
  • 9 ingredients to drag and drop
  • 18 recipes for potions both charming and uncalled for
  • An amnesiac skeleton who just wants to be a zombie
  • Pretty masks to hide grisly intentions
